name: ModelLine
description: The ModelLine class represents a model line in Revit.

properties.name: GeometryCurve
properties.description: Gets the geometry curve of the model line.

properties.name: LineStyle
properties.description: Gets or sets the line style.

methods.name: GetLineStyle()
methods.description: Gets the line style of the model line.

methods.name: SetLineStyle(ElementId)
methods.description: Sets the line style of the model line.
